GSD.product_version: versions from v5.0 to before v5.18.13
GSD.description:
raw: Fix a data-race around sysctl_raw_l3mdev_accept.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.13 by commit ab5adca2e17d6595f3fc0e25ccb6bcbe2e01ca4f, it was introduced in version v5.0 by commit 6897445fb194c8ad046df4a13e1ee9f080a5a21e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: raw: Fix a data-race around sysctl_raw_l3mdev_accept.
